name: Castor Oil
description: Castor Oil, also known as Arandi Ka Tel, is a versatile and natural oil derived from the seeds of the castor plant. Renowned for its numerous health and beauty benefits, this oil is rich in essential nutrients and offers a wide range of therapeutic properties.

name: Organic Multani Mitti
description: Discover the timeless beauty secret of Multani Mitti, a natural multani mitti powder renowned for its deep-cleansing and rejuvenating properties. Derived from pure, mineral-rich clay, this traditional skincare ingredient has been used for centuries to enhance skin health and radiance.

name: Eucalyptus Oil
description: Reap the refreshing and invigorating properties of Eucalyptus Oil, a versatile essential oil derived from the leaves of the eucalyptus tree. Known for its crisp, clean aroma, Eucalyptus Oil is a popular choice for aromatherapy and natural wellness.
